action.text: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 229

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 216

trait.name: Spell Turning
trait.text: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Head
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The chimera exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Triton Master of Waves

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 245

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The triton can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The triton's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: ray of frost (see "Actions" below)
2/day: cone of cold
1/day each: fog cloud, gust of wind, wind wall

trait.name: Summon Water Weird (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons 1d4} {@creature water weird. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The triton makes two attacks using Wave Touch and casts ray of frost.

action.name: Wave Touch
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) cold damage.

action.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the triton's next turn.

reaction.name: Frigid Shield
reaction.text: When a creature the triton can see targets the triton with an attack, the triton gains 10 temporary hit points. If the attack hits and reduces the temporary hit points to 0, each creature within 5 feet of the triton takes 9 (2d8) cold damage.

monster.spells: ray of frost, cone of cold, fog cloud, gust of wind, wind wall

monster.name: Triton Shorestalker

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 244

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The triton can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The triton's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: fog cloud, gust of wind

trait.name: Nimble Escape
trait.text: The triton can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The triton makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.

action.name: Urchin-Spine Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Poisoned Spine
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

monster.spells: fog cloud, gust of wind

monster.name: Tromokratis
monster.immune: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 254

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Tromokratis can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: When Tromokratis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Tromokratis fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: Tromokratis's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: Tromokratis deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
trait.text: Tromokratis has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against Tromokratis has disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Tromokratis makes three attacks: one with its pincer, one with its tail, and one with its tentacle grasp.

action.name: Pincer
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 26). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Tromokratis can't use this attack on anyone else.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.

action.name: Tentacle Grasp
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 26). If the target doesn't escape by the end of its next turn, Tromokratis throws the target up to 60 feet in a straight line. The target lands prone and takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Tromokratis, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Tromokratis's turns. If Tromokratis takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Tromokratis must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Tromokratis can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tromokratis regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
legendary.text: Tromokratis moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Tail
legendary.text: Tromokratis makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Tromokratis makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Mythic Actions
legendary.text: If Tromokratis's mythic trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Hearts of the Kraken.

legendary.name: Rampage
legendary.text: Tromokratis makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacle grasp.

legendary.name: Coral Growth (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Each creature within 10 feet of Tromokratis must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until the start of its next turn, Tromokratis and its hearts gain a +2 bonus to AC.

monster.name: Two-Headed Cerberus
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, stunned

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 215

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Multiheaded
trait.text: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The cerberus makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The cerberus exhales a 15-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 246

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The typhon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The typhon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The typhon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Bites, one to constrict, and one with its maw.

action.name: Flurry of Bites
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (8d6 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.

action.name: Maw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) acid damage.
